publisher.publisher-name: Institute of Computational Mathematices and Scientific/Engineering Computing(ICMSEC) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: NUMERICAL COMPUTATION OF BOUNDED SOLUTIONS FOR A SEMILINEAR ELLIPTIC EQUATION ON AN INFINITE STRIP

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1999 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: In this paper, we consider the computation of bounded solutions of a semilinear elliptic equation on an infinite strip. The dynamical system approach and reduction on center manifold are used to overcome the difficulties in numerical procedure.

ref.mixed-citation: W-J. Beyn, The numerical computation of connecting orbits in dynamical systems, IMA J. Numer. Anal., 9 (1990), 379-405.

Ma F., Numerical calculation of center manifolds for a class of infinite dimensional systems with applications, SIAM J. Numer. Anal., 32:3 (1995), 952-968.
Ma F., Numerical approximation of bounded solutions for semilinear elliptic equations in an unbounded cylindrical domain, Numerical Method for PDE, 9 (1993).
A. Mielke, Steady flows of inviscid fluids under localized perturbations, J. Diff. Equas., 65:1 (1986).
